name: Sarah M.
review: The Autumn Spice candle is absolutely divine! It fills my entire living room with the most wonderful warm scent. I've already ordered three more!

name: Jessica L.
review: I'm obsessed with the Hot Girl Summer candle! Perfect for my summer vibes. The coconut and pineapple blend is chef's kiss. Can't wait for it to be back in stock!

name: Michael R.
review: Bought the Self Care candle for my wife and she loves it! The eucalyptus and lavender combination is so relaxing. Great quality and burns evenly.

name: Amanda K.
review: The Vanilla Milk Shake candle smells exactly like a creamy vanilla dessert! Burns for hours and the scent lasts. Artisan Aromas has a customer for life!

name: David P.
review: At The Beach really does transport you to a tropical paradise. The mahogany wood adds such a nice depth to the coconut scent. Highly recommend!

name: Emily S.
review: I love supporting small businesses and Artisan Aromas exceeded my expectations! The Pina Colada candle is my new favorite. Amazing quality!
